snippet: A planned memorial to Dwight D. Eisenhower, with Frank Gehry as the architect, has raised hackles within the Eisenhower family.
abstract: Design plans for Washington, DC, memorial to former Pres Dwight D Eisenhower by architect Frank Gehry draws objections from the Eisenhower family, which asks that the project be delayed; family members contend that the statue of the two-term president, which portrays Eisenhower as a barefoot youth on the Kansas plains, ignores his adult achievements and mocks him as a callow rustic.
lead_paragraph: A planned memorial to Dwight D. Eisenhower, with Frank Gehry as the architect, has raised hackles within the Eisenhower family.

headline.seo: Eisenhower Family Raises Objections to Planned Memorial
headline.main: Eisenhower as Barefoot Boy? Family Objects to a Memorial
headline.print_headline: Eisenhower as Barefoot Boy? Family Objects to a Memorial
